sql-case.value: CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, status varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10), PRIMARY KEY(id))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10), UNIQUE(id))
CREATE TABLE t_order_item (order_item_id int, order_id int, user_id int, FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES t_order (order_id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE)
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10), INDEX idx_id (id)))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10), INDEX idx_id_status (id, status))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int PRIMARY KEY, status varchar(10), check(id > 10))
CREATE INDEX idx_id_status ON t_log (id, status)
